thread.title: Not Salman Khan but Katrina herself is turning producer for sister Isabel?
thread.title_full: Not Salman Khan but Katrina herself is turning producer for sister Isabel?

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE
title: Not Salman Khan but Katrina herself is turning producer for sister Isabel?
text:
Katrina sharing a light moment with sister Isabel. Mumbai: Gearing up to walk in the footsteps of her contemporaries is superstar Katrina Kaif. Yes, after Anushka Sharma and Priyanka Chopra, Kats is allegedly treading in the business aspect of film-making. The lovely actress is reportedly setting up her own production house sometime this year.
Rumour mills are abuzz with stories of how Kats is in talks with Salman Khan for a project that would launch her model-actress sister Isabel and Sonia, also a model based out of UK.
A close friend of Salman, however, has rubbished these rumours and revealed that the actress has taken the matter in her hands and will produce films to launch her sisters’ careers in the industry.
“Katrina and Salman discuss films extensively and are like family to each other. She has shown interest in venturing into film production soon while simultaneously balancing her acting gigs and has been reading scripts, discussing films with her close director friends as well. If there’s anyone who’ll launch her sister in a big Bollywood production, it’ll be Katrina herself,” revealed the source, adding that the actress has always taken keen interest in understanding the nitty-gritty of the filmmaking process and will soon plan a venture under her own banner,” said the source to a daily.
When Kats was approached for a comment on this, she reportedly said, “Nothing really has crystallised yet. I will produce a film one day… soon.”
Isabel frequently visits her star sister and is often spotted at B’town parties with Katrina. Isabel has already made her international debut with ‘Dr Cabbie’ alongside Kunal Nayyar.
The film was co-produced by Salman Khan.
